data.message: Any chance that you'll bring back the FB game "Bunco Blast" or something similar to it? So many of my friends miss it & can't wait for it to return. They've been teasing us for some time now about the return if this popular game. We miss "Bunco Blast"! :(

replies.message: Hi Michele. Apps and games are managed by developers outside of Facebook. If you have a question about an app or game, contact the developer directly. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2oJsp15. -Jessica
Thank you so much for your prompt response. I've tried contacting them but get no response. But I plan on  continuing to do so. Or maybe someone new will make a new app. My fingers are crossed. :)
